trans-unit.source: Represents a control property that is data-bound to an expression.
When a page is parsed, the page parser retains information about an expression and the property it is bound to in a <xref:System.Web.UI.BoundPropertyEntry> object.
Gets or sets the ID of the control that contains this binding.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.ID"></xref> of the control that contains this binding.
Gets or sets the type of the control that is being bound to at run time.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the control bound by the expression.
Gets or sets the value representing an expression during page parsing.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the expression.
Gets or sets the object used for evaluating the expression during page parsing.
An <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"></xref> for evaluating this expression.
Gets or sets the prefix for this expression.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the prefix.
Gets or sets the name of the data field bound to by the expression.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the data field name.
Gets or sets the format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the expression was generated by the parser.
`true` if the expression was generated by the parser; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the value of the control property is encoded.
`true` if the value of the control property is encoded; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the data retrieved from an expression builder object during page parsing.

An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> containing the data retrieved from an <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"></xref> after it has called <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder.ParseExpression(System.String,System.Type,System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext)"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property contains a `set` accessor.
`true` if the property does not contain a `set` accessor, which indicates that the property is `ReadOnly`; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the expression is bound to a control that allows for inserting, updating, or deleting data.
`true` if the expression is bound to a control that allows for inserting, updating, or deleting data; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether a control's `SetAttribute` method can be called.
`true` if the `SetAttribute` method can be called; otherwise, `false`.
